Examples

Learn the GARP language through practical examples, from simple organization definitions to complete information governance programs.

Basic Examples

Start with these fundamental examples to learn core concepts:

  • Simple Organization - Define an organization with basic attributes
  • Simple Policy - Create a policy with requirements
  • Retention Schedule - Define a retention schedule

Intermediate Examples

Build on the basics with more complex structures:

  • Organization with Policies - Link policies to organizations
  • Assessment with Findings - Conduct assessments and document findings

Advanced Examples

See how all concepts work together:

  • Complete GARP Program - A full information governance model

File Template

When creating new GARP files, start with this template that includes all available constructs.
